page.title: 15RECTORY FARM,SUDBURY,DERBYS
page.content: {Tenant Farmers:- }Stan and Doug- Ratcliffe. {Landowner:-}Lord Vernon. {Acreage:- }160 acres of crops and- grass. Three men work the farm,the two- tenants and one of their sons. {Crops:- }Barley and potatoes. {Dairy:- }86 cows for milk production, milked twice per day for collection. There are four tractors on the farm and other machinery including a furrow plough,potato digger,grass mower,spray fertilizer,loader and milking machinery. Among the named fields are Dover Field and Bank Field.
